SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Lightning Components: Create a Unified B2B Commerce for Visualforce Buyer Experience

Further integrate your fully featured Visualforce storefront with an Experience Builder site, and deliver a smooth transitional experience for your buyers across your solution. The B2B Commerce Header component for an Experience Builder site is enhanced with new content and functionality that provide continuity and parity across your Visualforce and Experience Builder assets.

Easily Redirect Home Page Links to an Experience or External URL
Provide clarity in a buyer experience where the technical distinction between Visualforce storefront and an Experience Builder site is intentionally obscured. You can specify whether Home page links on your storefront navigate to the Visualforce storefront home page, the Experience Builder site home page, or another URL. This decision also applies to Home page links included in the B2B Commerce Header component in an Experience Builder site. Choose the option that best supports your buyer's expectations and provides a successful experience.
Allow a Buyer to Access Account Information with Fewer Clicks
Provide quick access to the sections of the My Account page from anywhere on your Visualforce storefront or Experience Builder site. The B2B Commerce Header component in an Experience Builder site and the header component in a Visualforce storefront page now support a dropdown menu for the My Account link. Populate the dropdown menu with links to your supported My Account page sections, and save your buyers a few clicks during their storefront session.
Support Experience Builder Site Languages with the Locale Switcher Widget
If your storefront supports multiple locales, you can support the corresponding language from the Locale Switcher widget in the B2B Commerce Header component for an Experience Builder site.
Provide a Consistent Experience for Effective Accounts
If your storefront supports effective accounts, you can ensure that a selected effective account propagates throughout your Visualforce storefront or Experience Builder site.
Synchronize Cart Details between Visualforce Pages and Experience Builder
The B2B Commerce Header component for an Experience Builder site provides updated functionality for the cart icon, which synchronizes with other cart enhancements to provide a consistent buyer experience.
Rapidly Customize Your Experience with Open-Source Component Code
If you want to extend the default B2B Commerce Header component for B2B Commerce for Visualforce and customize its default behavior, you can get started quickly. Open-source code for the component is available in a public Github repository. Download the source code and start building your ideal Experience Builder site in just a few clicks!
